text:
I open a template made in excel (containing a graph) with poi 2.5-final and
write it on the disk again (with or without modification). When I open the
modified file in excel again, I get an error. the same works with poi 2.0-final. 

it also works if i remove the graph from the template.

i also commit an example, see attachment.
creator: nospam@dreier.cc
nospam@dreier.cc
text:
Created attachment 12251
simple java test case and an excel template file (eclipse project)

I have the same problem, except that my template contains only a jpg image : 
Open the template with poi 2.5-final, write it to a new file, open this new 
file with excel, crash.
The same test works fine with poi 2.0.
creator: beal6226@yahoo.fr
glens@apache.org
text:
Just tested this.  Works okay now on the CVS HEAD.  Not sure of release date of
HEAD at this stage.
This is a problem with the 3.0 alpha again.
creator: warnickr_1@isp01.net
